name: Rooted Warden
description:
A project that was made during a 48-hour period during the Global Game Jam 2023 event by a team of 7 developers.

Green is the color of HOPE. It shines through the dark, elevating the soul. But a black, ominous presence crawls from the corners to strangle the hope with EVIL ROOTS. But there’s you, the WARDEN. You answered the call to defend the LIGHT. “Rooted Warden” is a dark and moody game of territory defense. Control the hero in a dungeon setting. Brawl with ever-expanding roots of darkness. Save hope. Die trying. Now come and entangle yourself in a curse! 

Keyboard controls: 

  • WASD - movement 
  • Shift - dash
  • Space - attack
  • E - strong attack
  • ESC pause; 

Gamepad controls, tested on Xbox controller (UI requires mouse): 

  • Left thumb-stick - movement
  • Y - dash 
  • A - attack 
  • B - strong attack 
  • Select - pause;
